TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpClient extends System.Net.Http.HttpMessageInvoker

summary.span: 提供基底類別，用來傳送 HTTP 要求，以及從 URI 所識別的資源接收 HTTP 回應。

span.span: Provides a base class for sending HTTP requests and receiving HTTP responses from a resource identified by a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別執行個體做為傳送 HTTP 要求的工作階段。The class instance acts as a session to send HTTP requests. 執行個體是設定套用至該執行個體所執行的所有要求的集合。An instance is a collection of settings applied to all requests executed by that instance. 此外，每隔執行個體會使用自己的連接集區，隔離其要求從要求執行其他執行個體。In addition, every instance uses its own connection pool, isolating its requests from requests executed by other instances. 也會做為更特定的 HTTP 用戶端的基底類別。The also acts as a base class for more specific HTTP clients. 使用範例會提供特定的 Facebook web 服務的其他方法 FacebookHttpClient (GetFriends 方法中，執行個體)。An example would be a FacebookHttpClient providing additional methods specific to a Facebook web service (a GetFriends method, for instance). 在衍生的類別不應該覆寫類別虛擬方法。Derived classes should not override the virtual methods on the class. 請改用可接受的建構函式多載設定任何前置或後置要求管線處理。Instead, use a constructor overload that accepts to configure any pre- or post-request processing instead. 根據預設，.NET Framework 和 Mono 上用來將要求傳送至伺服器。By default on .NET Framework and Mono, is used to send requests to the server. 可以修改此行為，藉由指定不同的通道，其中一種建構函式多載採用做為參數的執行個體。This behavior can be modified by specifying a different channel in one of the constructor overloads taking a instance as parameter. 如果需要，功能，例如驗證或快取可以用來設定它執行個體可以傳遞至建構函式。If features like authentication or caching are required, can be used to configure settings and the instance can be passed to the constructor. 傳回的處理常式可以傳遞至其中一個建構函式多載採用參數。The returned handler can be passed to one of the constructor overloads taking a parameter. 如果應用程式使用和相關類別中的命名空間想要下載大量資料 （50 mb 或以上），則應用程式應該串流處理這些下載項目，並使用預設的緩衝處理。If an app using and related classes in the namespace intends to download large amounts of data (50 megabytes or more), then the app should stream those downloads and not use the default buffering. 如果預設的緩衝處理使用的用戶端記憶體使用量會變得非常大，而且可能會導致大幅降低效能。If the default buffering is used the client memory usage will get very large, potentially resulting in substantially reduced performance. 下列方法都是安全執行緒：The following methods are thread safe: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8. 9. 被要具現化一次和重複使用的應用程式生命週期。 is intended to be instantiated once and re-used throughout the life of an application. 每個要求的 HttpClient 類別具現化會耗盡可用在沈重負載下的通訊端數目。Instantiating an HttpClient class for every request will exhaust the number of sockets available under heavy loads. 這會導致 SocketException 錯誤。This will result in SocketException errors. 以下是正確地使用 HttpClient 範例。Below is an example using HttpClient correctly. ```csharp public class GoodController : ApiController { // OK private static readonly HttpClient HttpClient; static GoodController() { HttpClient = new HttpClient(); } } ``` 是包裝在每個平台可用的較低層級功能，其執行所在的高階 API。The is a high-level API that wraps the lower-level functionality available on each platform where it runs. 每個平台，便會嘗試使用最適合的可用傳輸：On each platform, tries to use the best available transport: | **主應用程式/執行階段****Host/Runtime** | **後端****Backend** | | --------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | Windows/.NET FrameworkWindows/.NET Framework | | | Windows/MonoWindows/Mono | | | Windows/UWPWindows/UWP | Windows 原生(支援 HTTP 2.0)Windows native (HTTP 2.0 capable) | | Windows/.NET CoreWindows/.NET Core | Windows 原生(支援 HTTP 2.0)Windows native (HTTP 2.0 capable) | | Android/XamarinAndroid/Xamarin | 選取此選項，在建置階段。Selected at build-time. 可以使用或設定為使用 Android 的原生 [`HttpURLConnection`](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/Java.Net.HttpURLConnection/)Can either use or be configured to use Android's native [`HttpURLConnection`](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/Java.Net.HttpURLConnection/) | | iOS、 tvOS、 watchOS/XamariniOS, tvOS, watchOS/Xamarin | 選取此選項，在建置階段。Selected at build-time. 可以使用或者設定為使用 Apple [ `NSUrlSession` ](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/MonoTouch.Foundation.NSUrlSession/) (支援 HTTP 2.0)Can either use or be configured to use Apple's [`NSUrlSession`](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/MonoTouch.Foundation.NSUrlSession/) (HTTP 2.0 capable) | | macOS/XamarinmacOS/Xamarin | 選取此選項，在建置階段。Selected at build-time. 可以使用或者設定為使用 Apple [ `NSUrlSession` ](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/MonoTouch.Foundation.NSUrlSession/) (支援 HTTP 2.0)Can either use or be configured to use Apple's [`NSUrlSession`](https://developer.xamarin.com/api/type/MonoTouch.Foundation.NSUrlSession/) (HTTP 2.0 capable) | | macOS/MonomacOS/Mono | | | macOS/.NET CoremacOS/.NET Core | `libcurl`-基礎 HTTP 傳輸 (支援 HTTP 2.0)`libcurl`-based HTTP transport (HTTP 2.0 capable) | | Linux/MonoLinux/Mono | | | Linux/.NET CoreLinux/.NET Core | `libcurl`-基礎 HTTP 傳輸 (支援 HTTP 2.0)`libcurl`-based HTTP transport (HTTP 2.0 capable) | 使用者也可以設定的特定傳輸叫用建構函式。Users can also configure a specific transport for by invoking the constructor that takes an . ### HttpClient 和.NET CoreHttpClient and .NET Core .NET Core 2.1 中，從開始類別而非`HttpClientHandler`提供這類使用較高層級的 HTTP 網路類別的實作`HttpClient`。Starting with .NET Core 2.1, the class instead of `HttpClientHandler` provides the implementation used by higher-level HTTP networking classes such as `HttpClient`. 您可以設定您的應用程式使用較舊改為呼叫方法，如下所示：You can configure your application to use the older instead by calling the method as follows: ```csharp AppContext.SetSwitch("System.Net.Http.useSocketsHttpHandler", false); ``` ```vb AppContext.SetSwitch("System.Net.Http.useSocketsHttpHandler", False) ``` ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Net.Http.HttpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.net.http.httpclient/cs/source.cs#1)] 上述程式碼範例會使用`async Task Main()`進入點。The preceding code example uses an `async Task Main()` entry point. 該功能需要 C# 7.1 或更新版本。That feature requires C# 7.1 or later.

span.span: The base address of Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the Internet resource used when sending requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當傳送含有相對 Uri，在訊息 Uri 將會新增至屬性來建立絕對 Uri。When sending a with a relative Uri, the message Uri will be added to the property to create an absolute Uri.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelPendingRequests() cil managed

summary.span: 取消這個執行個體上的所有暫止要求。

span.span: Cancel all pending requests on this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法中之後,執行個體仍可用來執行其他的要求。After calling this method, the instance can still be used to execute additional requests.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DefaultRequestHeaders As HttpRequestHeaders

summary.span: 取得應該在每個要求中傳送的標頭。

span.span: Gets the headers which should be sent with each request.

value.span: 應該藉由每個要求傳送的標頭。

span.span: The headers which should be sent with each request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的標頭不需要再次設定要求訊息。Headers set on this property don't need to be set on request messages again.

summary.span: 以非同步作業的方式，將 DELETE 要求傳送至指定的 URI。

span.span: Send a DELETE request to the specified Uri as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回的 物件會在讀取完整的回應 (包括內容) 之後完成。The returned object will complete after the whole response (including content) is read.

exception.span: 為 。

span.span: The request message was already sent by the instance.

exception.span: 要求已因基本問題 (例如網路連線、DNS 失敗、伺服器憑證驗證或逾時) 而失敗。

span.span: The request failed due to an underlying issue such as network connectivity, DNS failure, server certificate validation or timeout.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源； 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性處置 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. 呼叫這個方法時，呼叫方法來中止所有暫止要求。When this method is called, the method is called to abort all pending requests.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxResponseContentBufferSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxResponseContentBufferSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定讀取回應內容時要緩衝處理的位元組數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of bytes to buffer when reading the response content.

value.span: 讀取回應內容時要緩衝處理的位元組數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to buffer when reading the response content.

value.span: 此屬性的預設值是 2 GB。

span.span: The default value for this property is 2 gigabytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以設定屬性設為較低的值，以便讀取回應時，限制緩衝區之回應的大小。An app can set the property to a lower value to limit the size of the response to buffer when reading the response. 回應內容的大小是否大於 屬性中擲回例外狀況。If the size of the response content is greater than the property, an exception is thrown.

exception.span: 指定的大小小於或等於零。

span.span: The size specified is less than or equal to zero.

exception.span: 作業已經在目前的執行個體上啟動。

span.span: An operation has already been started on the current instance.

exception.span: 目前的執行個體已經過處置。

span.span: The current instance has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage> SendAsync(class System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage request, valuetype System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption completionOption) cil managed
Public Function SendAsync (request As HttpRequestMessage, completionOption As HttpCompletionOption) As Task(Of HttpResponseMessage)

param.name: request
param.span: 要傳送的 HTTP 要求訊息。

span.span: The HTTP request message to send.

param.name: completionOption
param.span: 當作業應該完成時 (可取得回應時或讀取整個回應內容之後)。

span.span: When the operation should complete (as soon as a response is available or after reading the whole response content).

summary.span: 以非同步作業的方式，傳送 HTTP 要求。

span.span: Send an HTTP request as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 值而定`completionOption`參數，傳回物件會完成，只要取得回應之後，或在讀取包括內容的完整回應。Depending on the value of the `completionOption` parameter, the returned object will complete as soon as a response is available or the entire response including content is read.

exception.span: 為 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan Timeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.Timeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要求逾時前等候的時間長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the timespan to wait before the request times out.

value.span: 要求逾時前等候的時間長度。

span.span: The timespan to wait before the request times out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 100,000 毫秒 (100 秒)。The default value is 100,000 milliseconds (100 seconds). 若要設定無限的逾時，請將屬性值設定為。To set an infinite timeout, set the property value to . 網域名稱系統 (DNS) 查詢可能需要最多 15 秒鐘傳回或逾時。如果您的要求包含需要解析的主機名稱，而且您設定的值小於 15 秒，可能需要 15 秒以上之前就會擲回以指出您的要求逾時。A Domain Name System (DNS) query may take up to 15 seconds to return or time out. If your request contains a host name that requires resolution and you set to a value less than 15 seconds, it may take 15 seconds or more before a is thrown to indicate a timeout on your request. 在相同的逾時將適用於所有的要求使用此執行個體。The same timeout will apply for all requests using this instance. 您也可以設定不同的逾時使用的個別要求的工作上。You may also set different timeouts for individual requests using a on a task. 請注意，只有在較短的兩個逾時將會套用。Note that only the shorter of the two timeouts will apply.

exception.span: 指定的逾時值小於或等於零，而且不是 。

span.span: The timeout specified is less than or equal to zero and is not .

exception.span: 作業已經在目前的執行個體上啟動。

span.span: An operation has already been started on the current instance.

exception.span: 目前的執行個體已經過處置。

span.span: The current instance has been disposed.
